name: Shy Chompers Trip: The Gardens of Confusion
name_original: Shy Chompers Trip: The Gardens of Confusion
description:
This is a game created for the 'Weekly Game Jam' 203 themes 'Eat The Enemy'. This is the first game published by the Team of Joshua Hall and Jake Horner.  This is an action stealth puzzle game!

Joshua Hall (Youtube: cheesemcpuff ) - Lead Programming, Game Design, Level Design.

Jake Horner (Instagram: jakedafartist) - Art & Animation, Programming, Game Design, Level Design.

https://www.instagram.com/jakedafartist/

https://www.youtube.com/user/cheesemcpuff
